data.title: Byron Cook
data.meta_description:
Welcome to the website of the 2020 ACM SIGPLAN International Symposium on Memory Management (ISMM). ISMM 2020 is co-located with PLDI 2020, and will be held virtually on June 16, 2020. 
The conference will feature presentations of our 8 accepted papers, an exciting keynote by Richard Jones, and several social events. Please register for free to attend. Registration closes on June 5. 
ISMM 2020 is going virtual 
As you may have seen on the PLDI website, the physical PLDI conference will be cancelled due to the COVID-19 situation and is moving to a virtual conference format.

Bio:

Byron Cook is Professor of Computer Science at University College London (UCL) and Senior Principal Scientist at Amazon. Byronâ€™s interests include computer/network security, program analysis/verification, programming languages, theorem proving, logic, hardware design, operating systems, and biological systems. See http://www0.cs.ucl.ac.uk/staff/b.cook/ for more information.
